name: Tiff Needell
introduction: Timothy "Tiff" Needell (born October 29 1961) is a former driver. In Formula One, he had a pair of drives in 1980 for Ensign, retiring in Belgium and failing to qualify in Monaco. He has also raced 14 times in the 24 Hours of Le Mans, and spent nine seasons in the British Touring Car series. He has been involved in a wide range of other projects, including race commentary and working in both versions of the Top Gear show.
